# Code of Conduct

## Our Pledge

Wyvern is committed to providing a welcoming, safe, and respectful environment for all contributors and users. Everyone is expected to behave professionally and considerately.

## Expected Behavior

- Treat others with respect.
- Communicate constructively.
- Respect othersâ€™ time and contributions.

## Unacceptable Behavior

- Harassment, threats, or discrimination.
- Disruptive or hostile behavior that interferes with the project.
- Sharing private information without consent.

## Scope

This applies to all interactions in Wyvern repositories, communication channels, and official events.
